Class Configuration

                    +--se.vingmedia.xss.server.Configuration
public class Configuration
extends java.util.Properties

A Configuration objects holds all information acquired by the server from the system configuration file, along with helper methods to retreive that information. It also holds references to certain module objects.

See Also:
